page.description: Get the page number within a group
page.discussion: PAGENO() returns the current page number of a printed layout. If the optional Group Name is specified, the page count will be restarted each time the group repeats.

section.example: "Page " + ltrim( str( pageno() ) ) -> "Page 5", if the current page number is 5.
